name: Aspected Benefic

help: Restores Target's HP. Cure Potency: 190  Nocturnal Sect Cure Potency: 250 Diurnal Sect Effect: Regen  Cure Potency: 140  Duration: 18s  Effect Cannot Be Stacked.
